ygData.subject: Re: Time for a "/feedback" to tell Verant the lung/rebreather is too heavy.
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrads on the Rebreather  WTG Dweeb Fire of Cazic-Tule ... From:  To:  Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999 11:30 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Congrads on the Rebreather WTG


Dweeb Fire of Cazic-Tule
----- Original Message -----
From: <sragan@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999 11:30 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Time for a "/feedback" to tell Verant the
lung/rebreather is too heavy.


> From: sragan@...
>
> Well Folks,
>
> I finally made it! After a long and depressing road I finally built up the
skill needed to make the tinkered rebreathers. But, they are too dang heavy!
At a cost of 3250 (price I'm trying to sell them for) peaple are reluctant
to buy them since they weigh 10 stone.
>
> Its time every gnome on the list here did a "/feedback" and tell Verant
they need to reduce the weigh on them to 5 stone. We have had enough trouble
making and selling them as it is.
>
> Just do it, a quick 30 second note will go a long way.
>
> Cheers,
>
> FizzWizz of Tunare
>
> >
